directions.d: Line a baking sheet with a sheet of aluminum foil and spray with nonstick cooking oil.
Place the salmon fillets onto the foil.
Sprinkle dried basil over fillets and then top with thin slices of tomato.
Lightly drizzle olive oil over tomatoes and top with parmesan cheese.
Bake in the oven for approximately 20 minutes.
Stop baking when the salmon is opaque in the center or can be easily pulled apart with a fork.
The parmesan cheese should be lightly browned on top.
